text: 1999 Copa América was the 39th Copa América tournament and it took place in Paraguay. Brazil won the tournament. ==Results== ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 5 0 +5 7 3 2 0 1 4 3 +1 6 3 0 2 1 1 2 -1 2 3 0 1 2 3 8 -5 1 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 10 1 +9 9 3 2 0 1 5 3 +2 6 3 1 0 2 3 2 +1 3 3 0 0 3 1 13 -12 0 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 6 1 +5 9 3 2 0 1 5 4 +1 6 3 1 0 2 2 4 -2 3 3 0 0 3 3 7 -4 0 ===Knockout stage=== ==References== ==Other websites== *RSSSF Category:Copa América tournaments Category:1999 in association football Category:1999 in South America Category:Football in Paraguay Category:July 1999 events Category:History of Paraguay
title: 1999 Copa América
